home__description: Passionate about learning, research, and contributing to advancements in AI, data science, and bioinformatics.
about__description:
Undergraduate student majoring in AI and Data Science at USTC(University of Science & Technology of China).
My interests include:
qualification1__subtitle: University of Science & Technology of China
experience1__description: Participated in a one-week exchange program at Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (HKUST), focusing on the intersection of machine learning and physics. Attended the 'When Physics Meets Machine Learning' lecture series and explored cutting-edge research guided by leading experts.
experience2__description: Represented the USTC-Software team at the iGEM 2024 Jamboree. Delivered project presentations on bioinformatics innovations, interacted with global teams, and contributed to our successful submission in the multi-omics analysis platform category.
experience3__description: Website adaptable to all devices, with ui components and animated interactions.
